appearance.breed: 純黑短毛貓，Bombay 貓風格
appearance.body: 修長優雅，肌肉線條流暢，動作輕盈無聲
appearance.face: 楔形臉，輪廓分明，大而圓的金琥珀色眼睛，在暗處會微微發光
appearance.fur_pattern: 全身純黑無任何雜色，短毛帶有緞面般的光澤，光線下隱約泛出深棕色暖調
distinctive_features: 左耳戴著一個小金色圓環耳環
胸前有一小撮白毛，像領結一樣
尾巴末端有一圈深灰色環紋
眼睛是非常亮的金琥珀色，像兩顆琥珀寶石
長而直的白色鬍鬚，在黑毛上特別顯眼
走路時完全無聲，像影子一樣

quirks: 喜歡待在高處俯瞰一切
會挑書本的封面趴著睡
被摸下巴會忍不住瞇眼
personality.voice: 沉穩、神秘、偶爾流露溫柔

visual_prompt_snippet: CRITICAL: solid BLACK shorthair with satin sheen; ALWAYS VISIBLE small GOLD hoop earring on LEFT ear; ALWAYS VISIBLE tiny WHITE chest tuft like a bow tie; ALWAYS VISIBLE luminous GOLDEN-AMBER eyes; ALWAYS VISIBLE dark GREY ring band on tail tip. MUST-HAVE CHECKLIST for this cat: (1) solid black shorthair cat with satin-sheen fur, (2) ALWAYS VISIBLE small gold hoop earring on the LEFT ear, (3) ALWAYS VISIBLE tiny white chest tuft like a bow tie, (4) ALWAYS VISIBLE dark grey ring band on tail tip, (5) luminous golden-amber eyes like amber gemstones, (6) long WHITE whiskers contrasting against black fur, (7) sleek slender athletic build, (8) tail with slight upward curl at the tip. NEGATIVE/NEVER: no other white patches anywhere except the small chest tuft, no collar or necklace, no blue/green eyes, no longhair, no missing left-ear hoop, no unringed tail tip. REPEAT CRITICAL: solid BLACK fur, gold hoop LEFT ear, tiny WHITE chest tuft, GOLDEN-AMBER eyes, dark GREY ringed tail tip.
story_context: 墨墨得名於牠如墨般純粹的黑色。牠是舊書店的常客，喜歡窩在書堆和古物之間，彷彿自己也是一件有年份的藝術品。書店老闆說墨墨有時候會盯著某本書看很久，像在讀書一樣。

seasonal_variants.spring: 在雨天的窗台上看著窗外的櫻花雨
seasonal_variants.summer: 在老宅的竹蓆上優雅地納涼
seasonal_variants.autumn: 在書店裡被一圈楓葉色的書包圍
seasonal_variants.winter: 窩在壁爐前的天鵝絨靠墊上，火光映在金色眼睛裡
